issue.title: [C++] Do not pass -Wno-noexcept-type for compilers that do not support it
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2776](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2776). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This can be seen in the manylinux1 build for example

```Java

cc1plus: warning: unrecognized command line option "-Wno-noexcept-type" [enabled by default]
```
